dimensions:
Warp: 116 cm (45 1/2 in.)
Weft: (2 pieces sewn together) 157 cm (61 1/2 in.)
Height of repeat: 58 cm (22 3/4 in.)
title: The First loves of Henry IV
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description: Four scenes, captioned in French, showing four different love affairs. One scene is only completed when lengths of fabric are sewn together as a straight repeat. The love affairs are numbered. The captions are very difficult to read as they are on a diagonally striped background.
name: Textile
